fxInfo_citation: Brambor et al. (2016); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: A statistical agency is an official government organization exclusively devoted to gathering numerical information in a variety of subjects about the country. This may be a completely independent agency or a distinguishable office or department within another governmental agency.
fxInfo_question: Is there a national statistical agency?
name: v3ststatag
